lyrics.lyric: Trouble Is A Friend
lyrics.tlyric: 烦恼是朋友

lyrics.lyric: Trouble he will find you no matter where you go oh oh
lyrics.tlyric: 无论你在哪里，烦恼都会找到你

lyrics.lyric: No matter if you're fast no matter if you're slow oh oh
lyrics.tlyric: 无论你快也好慢也罢

lyrics.lyric: The eye of the storm wanna cry in the morn oh oh
lyrics.tlyric: 平静如风眼但到了清晨依旧想哭

lyrics.lyric: You're fine for a while but you start to lose control
lyrics.tlyric: 你刚刚好转，却又要开始失去控制

lyrics.lyric: He's there in the dark he's there in my heart
lyrics.tlyric: 他潜伏在暗处，他藏在我心中

lyrics.lyric: He waits in the wings he's gotta play a part
lyrics.tlyric: 他已经准备就绪，即将登场

lyrics.lyric: Trouble is a friend yeah trouble is a friend of mine
lyrics.tlyric: 烦恼是朋友，耶，烦恼是我的朋友

lyrics.lyric: Trouble is a friend but trouble is a foe oh oh
lyrics.tlyric: 烦恼是朋友，但烦恼也是敌人

lyrics.lyric: And no matter what I feed him he always seems to grow oh oh
lyrics.tlyric: 并且无论我怎么喂养，他似乎总是在生长

lyrics.lyric: He sees what I see and he knows what I know oh oh
lyrics.tlyric: 他能见我所见，知我所知

lyrics.lyric: So don't forget as you ease on down my road
lyrics.tlyric: 因此当你轻松前行时，也要铭记

lyrics.lyric: He's there in the dark he's there in my heart
lyrics.tlyric: 他潜伏在暗处，他藏在我心中

lyrics.lyric: He waits in the wings he's gotta play a part
lyrics.tlyric: 他已经准备就绪，即将登场

lyrics.lyric: Trouble is a friend yeah trouble is a friend of mine oh oh
lyrics.tlyric: 烦恼是朋友，耶，烦恼是我的朋友

lyrics.lyric: So don't be alarmed if he takes you by the arm
lyrics.tlyric: 所以当他抓住你手臂时，不要惊慌

lyrics.lyric: I roll down the window, but I'm a sucker for his charm
lyrics.tlyric: 我摇下了窗户，但抵挡不住他的魔力

lyrics.lyric: Trouble is a friend yeah trouble is a friend of mine
lyrics.tlyric: 烦恼是朋友，耶，烦恼是我的朋友

lyrics.lyric: How I hate the way he makes me feel
lyrics.tlyric: 我多么讨厌他给我的感觉

lyrics.lyric: And how I try to make him leave
lyrics.tlyric: 我试图让他离开

lyrics.lyric: I try oh oh I try
lyrics.tlyric: 我尝试，我努力尝试

lyrics.lyric: But he's there in the dark he's there in my heart
lyrics.tlyric: 但他潜伏在暗处，他藏在我心中

lyrics.lyric: He waits in the wings he's gotta play a part
lyrics.tlyric: 他已经准备就绪，即将登场

lyrics.lyric: Trouble is a friend yeah trouble is a friend of mine
lyrics.tlyric: 烦恼是朋友，耶，烦恼是我的朋友

lyrics.lyric: So don't be alarmed if he takes you by the arm
lyrics.tlyric: 所以当他抓住你手臂时，不要惊慌

lyrics.lyric: I roll down the window, but I'm a sucker for his charm
lyrics.tlyric: 我摇下了窗户，但抵挡不住他的魔力

lyrics.lyric: Trouble is a friend yeah trouble is a friend of mine
lyrics.tlyric: 烦恼是朋友，耶，烦恼是我的朋友
